title: Ep 203: California Fires / Rapel Valley, Chile
itunes:title: California Fires / Rapel Valley, Chile
description: We discuss the wildfires raging in the North Coast of California and give ideas on what that could mean for the industry. Then we talk about one of the best (maybe unknown) value regions for wine in the world, Rapel Valley in Chile and its sub regions!
content:encoded: We discuss the wildfires raging in the North Coast of California and give ideas on what that could mean for the industry. Then we talk about one of the best (maybe unknown) value regions for wine in the world, Rapel Valley in Chile and its sub regions!

itunes:author: Wine for Normal People
